a:entry.a:title: FLOCK!
a:entry.reducedDescription: Singleplayer, Local 2 Player Co-operative, High Definition. Play Flock!, the hilarious herding hootenanny of intergalactic proportions! Use your UFO and its alien beams to herd a variety of cute, cuddly animals across a patchwork landscape and into your Motherflocker. With over 50 interactive levels and a side-splitting sense of humor, Flock! is a sandbox action puzzle game like no other. Squash, stretch, roll, and move everything in this hand stitched-and-stuffed world to complete your alien…
a:entry.fullDescription: Singleplayer, Local 2 Player Co-operative, High Definition. Play Flock!, the hilarious herding hootenanny of intergalactic proportions! Use your UFO and its alien beams to herd a variety of cute, cuddly animals across a patchwork landscape and into your Motherflocker. With over 50 interactive levels and a side-splitting sense of humor, Flock! is a sandbox action puzzle game like no other. Squash, stretch, roll, and move everything in this hand stitched-and-stuffed world to complete your alien abduction. Play co-op with a friend, and even create and share your own crazy levels online with the built-in level editor! Brought to you by the talented guys and gals at Proper Games and Capcom.
